original_title: To Fall in Love and Break it Off
overview: When the time comes for Nick Wabash (Patrick Jackson) and Sarah Lyman's (Marin Koch) relationship to end, they each must cope with the loss in their own unique ways, but as they begin to lose control of themselves, they start to rely more and more on the help of their friends.  Based on their own experiences, writer/director Nolen Stevens and writer/producer Edie Barlin bring the dramatic beginnings and ends that come with being in high school to life in this split-narrative feature film.
tagline: You are not responsible for anyone else's happiness.
title: To Fall in Love and Break it Off
